description.en:
Vilified by others as a "witch", Evris, the youngest daughter of the House of Bradley, is engaged to Mark, the fifth prince of the Kingdom of Klengel. When he abruptly announces that their engagement is broken off, Evris is plunged into despair. However, someone reaches out to her instead... The cross-dressing crown prince (♀) of a neighboring country!?

This is the story of a red-haired witch who manipulates shadows and a cross-dressing crown prince (♀) who is serving as a body double for her missing older brother. 

The curtain rises on a fantasy romantic comedy of a girl being teased by a princess!

Serialization began in the July 2023 issue of *Yuri Hime*.
description.ja:
「魔女」と罵られるブラッドリー家の末娘・イヴリスは、婚約相手であるクレンゲル王国第5王子・マルクに突然の婚約破棄を宣言されていた。絶望のどん底に落とされるイヴリス。しかし、そんな彼女に手を差し伸べるのは…隣国の男装皇太子!?
影を操る赤髪の魔女令嬢と失踪した兄の影武者となる男装皇子。
王子様系女子に翻弄されるファンタジーラブコメ開幕！
description.ru:
Эйвери, младшая дочь дома Брэдли, проклинаемая окружающими как "ведьма", помолвлена с Марком, пятым принцем королевства Кленгель. Когда он неожиданно объявляет, что их помолвка расторгнута, Эйвери впадает в отчаяние. Однако кто-то протягивает ей руку помощи... Наследный принц (♀) соседней страны?!

Это история о ведьме, управляющей тенями, и о переодетом наследном принце (♀), который является двойником пропавшего старшего брата.

Занавес приподнимается над фэнтезийной романтической комедией о девушке, которую дразнит принцесса!
description.tr:
Bu, gölgeleri manipüle eden kızıl saçlı bir cadı ile kayıp ağabeyinin dublörü olarak rol yapan melez veliaht prensin hikâyesidir.

Diğerleri tarafından “cadı” olarak lanetlenen Bradley Hanesi’nin en küçük kızı Evris, Klengel Krallığı’nın beşinci prensi Mark ile nişanlıdır. Mark aniden nişanı bozduğunu açıklayınca Evris umutsuzluğa kapılır. Ancak biri ona yardım elini uzatacaktır… Komşu ülkelerden birinin karşı cinsin kıyafetlerini giymeyi seven veliaht prensi!? Bir prenses tarafından dalga geçilen bir kızın fantastik romantik komedisinde perde açılıyor!

altTitles.ja: ペルソナ5

description.en: The story focuses on the 16-year-old protagonist, Akira Kurusu, who got transferred to Shujin High School in Tokyo after he was sued by a man with political connection for a non-existent violence when Akira saved a woman from being molested by the man, leading to his probation. Arriving in Tokyo, he finds a mysterious app got installed into his phone that enables him to enter another world formed from corrupt hearts of adults where he awakens his power called Persona. During his times there, he is joined by two fellow students Ryuuji Sakamoto and Ann Takamaki, and a shape-shifting cat-like creature known as Morgana. Feeling suppressed by their environment, the four form a group known as the "Phantom Thieves of Heart" to steal corrupt hearts of adults and reform society.

altTitles.en: Vengeful Lover
Revenge Lover

description.en: Yan Shuangshuang watched her former lover die before her eyes. An angel appeared, giving her a chance to live again. However, after her rebirth, everything went wrong.

title.en: The Blond Yankee and The Punishment Game

altTitles.ja: 金髪ヤンキーと罰ゲーム

description.en:
As part of her punishment game, the transfer student, Shindou Eruko, must talk to the coolest delinquent in the school, which turns out to be Hoshi Natsuki, the blonde delinquent in the class next door. However, she soon found out that Hoshi-kun might not be as scary as he looks...

This manga is Konogi Yoshiru's fantasy take on  [Shingeki no Eroko-san](https://mangadex.org/title/bdfc7777-f1ee-4131-82cb-2fb5861d32e1/shingeki-no-eroko-san-hen-na-oneesan-wa-danshikousei-to-nakayoku-naritai), depicting a setting with Eruko being in the same age as Hoshi-kun. It was later adapted in the main title as Eruko's dream sequence.

description.en:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

altTitles.en: Ear Slap

description.en:
Cheon Taepyeong, the President of the Taepyeong Detective Agency, has a peculiar ability to see through a person once he slaps them. He enjoys this process, and has made money by solving requests using his ability alongside the gangster, Won Sangtaek, Special agent Yoo Jungik, and the scammer, Gu Kangjo. He was living a happy life with satisfaction… unlike his miserable past which has been holding him back.

description.en: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
description.es:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.ja:
ある日、青柳明人のクラスにシャーロット・ベネットが留学してくる。
清楚で上品な振る舞いと可愛らしい容姿のシャーロットに、クラスメイトの誰もが心を惹かれるが、
明人は冷静に「住む世界が違う」と感じ、一歩引いていた。

しかし、迷子になっていたシャーロットの妹・エマを助けたことで明人の日常は激変し…！？
description.pl:
Pewnego dnia Charlotte Bennett trafia do klasy Aoyagi Akihito. Jej właściwe i wyrafinowane maniery oraz uroczy wygląd podbiły serca jego kolegów z klasy, ale Akihito spokojnie robi krok do tyłu, czując, że „żyje w innym świecie”.

Jednak pomoc zaginionej siostrze Charlotte, Emmie, wywraca jego codzienne życie do góry nogami...?
description.es-la:
Un día, Charlotte Bennett se traslada a la clase de Aoyagi Akihito. Sus modales correctos y refinados y su aspecto adorable cautivan los corazones de sus compañeros, pero Akihito se aparta tranquilamente, sintiendo que ella «vive en un mundo diferente».

Sin embargo, ayuda a Ema, la hermana perdida de Charlotte, altera su vida cotidiana...?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, Charlotte Bennett foi transferida para a turma de Aoyagi Akihito.

Seus maneirismos adequados e refinados e aparência adorável conquistaram os corações de seus colegas de classe, mas Akihito calmamente dá um passo para trás, sentindo que ela “vive em um mundo diferente”.

No entanto, ajudar a irmã perdida de Charlotte, Ema, coloca sua vida diária em uma convulsão...!?

description.en: When the ruthless Lord Tiwakan seizes the kingdom of Nauk, Princess Liene Arsac faces an impossible choice: marry her captor or watch her homeland crumble. But Lord Tiwakan isn’t just after power; he desires Liene, and his devotion stirs a mix of fear and undeniable attraction within her. With her former betrothed, Lafitte, still missing, Liene must decide whether to trust Tiwakan's promises or hold out hope for a rescue. As dangerous secrets come to light, Liene’s decision could change the fate of Nauk—and her own heart—forever.
description.pl: Kiedy bezwzględny lord Tiwakan przejmuje królestwo Nauk, księżniczka Liene Arsac staje przed niemożliwym wyborem: poślubić swojego porywacza lub patrzeć, jak jej ojczyzna się rozpada. Ale lord Tiwakan pragnie nie tylko władzy; pożąda Liene, a jego oddanie wzbudza w niej mieszankę strachu i niezaprzeczalnego przyciągania. Ponieważ jej były narzeczony, Lafitte, wciąż jest uznawany za zaginionego, Liene musi zdecydować, czy zaufać obietnicom Tiwakana, czy też mieć nadzieję na ratunek. Gdy niebezpieczne sekrety wychodzą na jaw, decyzja Liene może zmienić los Nauk - i jej własnego serca - na zawsze.

description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

description.en: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
description.ja: メンヘラ女子×ヤンデレ男子の危険で歪な恋!?　つむぎは歴代彼氏に「重すぎる」と捨てられてきたメンヘラ女子。彼氏のスマホを勝手に覗き怒られ、家から追い出されてしまう。そんな時助けてくれたのは、自分を全肯定してくれる超優しい年下の男の子、愛士。彼の優しい慰めで傷ついた心が安らぐつむぎだったが、愛士には秘密があって…!?

It seemed like everything was over, but suddenly he found himself in another world! He becomes an adventurer, transforming into Kizuna Red, and continues fighting to save people in trouble! Here he meets a young Wizard named Idola and his journey in this new world begins!
description.ja: 悪の組織との最終決戦で、敵と相打ちになった戦隊ヒーローの浅垣灯悟。命を落としたかに思われたが、気が付くと異世界に転生していたのだった！　異世界でも困った人々を救うため冒険者となり、キズナレッドに変身して今日も戦い続ける――！

John is red-haired and freckled. His only pride is that he is a close friend of the school's popular twins, Jekyll and Hyde. The twins always pretended to be each other, but suddenly one of the twins died. Who was left... Which one!?

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

description.en:
Before he knew it, Masato had been transported to a world where there were just a few more women than in his original world. However, aside from the fact that women were a little more assertive, the world wasn’t much different from the one he came from... or so he thought. 

Little did he know, the kindness he spread, based on the standards of his old world, was saving those around him more than he could imagine. He was unaware that this kindness was causing the women around him to develop intense feelings for him. 

This is the story of a protagonist who believes he can live an ordinary life, unknowingly making the heroines fall in love with him, and eventually realizing just how heavy their feelings are — until they make him understand it for himself...!
description.id: masato telah berpindah ke dunia dimana wanita lebih banyak daripada laki-laki. tapi selain dari wanita yang lebih banyak tidak ada banyak perbedaan dari dunia asalnya... begitulah yang dia pikirkan.tanpa disadari kebaikan yang dia lakukan- membuat wanita di sekitarnya memiliki perasaan padanya.ini adalah kisah seorang protagonis yang yakin kalau dia bisa menjalani kehidupan dengan normal, tanpa sadar membuat wanita jatuh cinta padanya, dan akhirnya menyadari betapa mendalamnya perasaan mereka- sampai mereka memaksa mc untuk mengerti!
description.ja:
気付いたら、元いた世界よりちょっとだけ女性の多い世界に転移していた主人公・将人。でも、女性が少しだけ積極的なだけで、前の世界と変わらない…? そんな甘い考えで生活を始めた彼は知らない。

元の世界基準で彼が振りまく優しさに、周りの彼女たちがどれだけ救われたのかを。そして、彼に激重な感情を向け始めたということを…。 

これは、普通に生きられると思い込んでいる主人公が無自覚にヒロインたちを恋に落とし、最終的にちょっと(?)愛の重いヒロインたちに"分からされる"までの物語であるー!

description.en:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
description.fr:
"Est-ce que c'est bien de tuer des gens ?"  

Un thriller de vengeance par Shiryu Nakatake, un nouveau venu dans le magazine Bessatsu Shōnen.  

Shun Uruma, un élève de 6ème, a été nommé "Sujet de test A" par cinq de ses camarades de classe. Il a été sévèrement malmené et a vécu un enfer. Sa seule joie était son frère, qui l'aimait, et ses parents, qui le protégeaient… jusqu'à ce que ces cinq monstres tuent sa famille.  
Lorsqu'il perd finalement tout et qu'il affronte le véritable enfer, un sombre "souhait" naît en lui. Il renaît sous l'entraînement de son grand-père, qui a servi dans une unité secrète pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale. Aujourd'hui, quatre ans plus tard, il apparaît devant son ennemi juré.  

"Je ne laisserai personne m'enlever cette vengeance."
description.ja:
人は、殺してもいい？　 　
「別マガ」沸騰の新星・中武士竜が描く、背徳の復讐サスペンス！
「俊、改心した者は見逃せ。人には生まれ変わるチャンスが必要や。」
「じいちゃん、僕は奴らが変わってないことを祈るよ。」
──人ならざる化け物たちを斃すため、少年もまた、人ならざる何かに成った。


“実験体Ａ”と名付けられ、同級生5人から嬲られる日々。小学6年生の漆間俊は、壮絶ないじめに苦しむ「地獄」の中にいた。だが、そこには兄想いの弟と、子を守る父母という「救い」があった。あの日、5人の化け物たちが、鬼畜の所業で家族を奪い去るまでは……。やがて、全てを失い、真の地獄を見た俊の中に暗い「願い」が宿った。戦時中、秘密部隊に所属した祖父の指導の下、生まれ変わる少年。そして4年が経った時、彼は因縁の敵の前に姿を現す……。この復讐は誰にも渡さない。
description.es-la:
**"¿Está bien matar a la gente?"** 
Un traicionero suspenso de venganza de Shiryu Nakatake, un recién llegado a Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

**"Shun, si alguien ha cambiado, déjalo ir y no hagas nada. Hay que darle la oportunidad de renacer".**

**"Abuelo, espero que no se reencarne".** 
Para derrotar a varios monstruos no humanos, el chico también se convirtió en algo no humano.  

Shun Uruma, un estudiante de sexto grado, fue nombrado "Cuerpo experimental: A" por cinco de sus compañeros de clase y sufrió un severo acoso escolar y vivió un infierno. Su única paz era con su hermano, que le quería, y sus padres, que le protegían... . hasta que los cinco monstruos mataron a su familia.  

Cuando finalmente lo pierde todo y se enfrenta al verdadero infierno, un oscuro "deseo" nace dentro de Shun. Renace bajo el entrenamiento de su abuelo, que sirvió en una unidad secreta durante la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Ahora, cuatro años después, se presenta frente a su predestinado enemigo.  

**"No dejaré que NADIE se interponga en mi venganza".**
description.pt-br: "É certo matar pessoas?" - Um suspense de vingança traiçoeira e vil de Shiryu Nakatake, mangaka recém-chegado à revista Bessatsu Shonen. - "Shun, deixe aqueles que mudarem viver. Pessoas precisam de oportunidades pra renascer." "Vovô, eu espero que eles não hajam mudado em nada." Para aniquilar vários monstros desumanos, um garoto também se tornou algo desumano. Shun Uruma, então colegial do sexto ano, foi nomeado de "Cobaia A" por cinco de seus colegas de classe. Severamente intimidado, viveu sob terror. Seu único consolo era seu irmão, que o amava, e seus pais, que o protegiam ... Porém, aqueles cinco monstros mataram até mesmo sua família. Ao perder tudo, ele se vê em um verdadeiro inferno; mas um "desejo" sombrio desperta em Shun. Renascido sob o treinamento de seu avô – que serviu em uma unidade militar secreta durante a II Guerra Mundial – após quatro anos, ele reaparece diante de seus inimigos predestinados. "Eu não vou deixar NINGUÉM tirar essa vingança de mim."

One day, when her classmate Narumiya Yuu finds out about this, instead of the ridicule she expected, Yuu instead invites Haru to form their own musical group… A shared story of music and youth between two girls, each burdened by the past.

The first prince is head over heels in love with the pretty daughter of a baron. In order to save the villainous young lady, who is the prince's fiancée, from the verge of being unfairly called off, he secretly works behind the scenes.

The leader of bullying is Ayako Takashimazu, the daughter of a large company. Hana, who was accused of theft by her, was forced to leave school...!?

(from mangaupdates)
description.ja:
いじめによってすべてを奪われた女が別人に生まれ変わり、地獄の復讐に身を投じる！

昭和20年、太平洋戦争が終わりかけていた時代、樺太（からふと）で生まれ育った少女・市村ハナは、醜い容姿のため女学校で凄惨ないじめを受けていた。いじめのリーダー格は大会社の令嬢・高島津絢子。彼女によって泥棒の濡れ衣を着せられたハナは、退学に追い込まれてしまう。やがてソ連軍が空襲を開始し、樺太から北海道へ逃れる船に乗り込んだハナ一家だったが、いじめグループによって船から追い出されてしまい……。
description.vi:
Một cô gái với cuộc đời bị lấy đi tất cả mọi thứ do bị bắt nạt, vu oan đã tái sinh thành một người khác và cô quyết định trả thù tất cả những ai đã góp phần đẩy cuộc đời mình vào bước đường cùng!
Ichimura Hana, một cô gái sinh ra và lớn lên ở Karafuto, bị bắt nạt dã man tại một trường nữ sinh vì ngoại hình xấu xí của mình. Cầm đầu nhóm bắt nạt cô là Takashimazu Ayako, thiên kim tiểu thư của công ty sản xuất giấy lớn nhất Karafuto thời bấy giờ. Sau một lần bị vu cáo là kẻ trộm, Hana đã bị đuổi học.
Một thời gian sau, trong một cuộc di tản bởi trận không kích của quân Liên Xô, gia đình Hana đáng ra đã lên được một con tàu để thoát khỏi Karafuto đến Hokkaido, nhưng cả nhà cô đã bị xua đuổi khỏi tàu bởi chính sự vu cáo của bè lũ bắt nạt đó...

Jiho caught Jungmin's eye- a returning student at the freshmen welcoming party… Be it for women or men, Jungmin is actually a major Ul-ppa* (*Korean slang for someone who is weak for beautiful and handsome people) and he finds Jiho extremely attractive. That was the extent of their first meeting, but for some reason, their strings of fate kept getting tangled with each other?!

"Ah-jin," who was enjoying the game using her younger brother's account, approached the female user [Flower Princess] for the sake of the guild, but ended up being identified as a lurking female. "Actually, I'm a woman...!" Meanwhile, 'Ji-hyeon,' who is secretly active as [Flower Princess], feels that the voice in the video sent by Ah-jin sounds familiar...

description.en: Kurata Hikaru has fallen in love with her classmate Kira Kairi at first sight. Now, she's too lovestruck to concentrate on her studies. Her plan? Get Kairi to reject her so she can focus again.
description.id: Kurata Hikaru jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama dengan teman sekelasnya Kira Kairi. Sekarang, dia jadi terlalu gila cinta dan tidak bisa konsentrasi dengan pelajaran. Jadi, dia berencana meminta Kairi untuk menolak cintanya agar dia bisa kembali fokus belajar lagi.

description.en:
I am a wanderer martial artist. I don’t shy away from blood, but I’m ready to retire. Should I take one last job? or not?

For many long years, he has roamed as a wandering martial artist's, living as a hired blade to make ends meet.

But now, he finds himself utterly penniless, living in poverty with nothing to his name.

As a master of martial arts at the peak level, he makes a decision, to take on one final, high-stakes mission, earn a fortune, and put an end to his life as a wanderer.

The story follows his journey as he takes on this last assignment and the unexpected twists that unfold along the way.

altTitles.ja: JIN―仁―

description.en:
After a strange encounter with a mysterious carcinogenic fetus he found inside a patient’s skull, brain surgeon Minakata Jin slipped back through time. Equipped with modern medical knowledge, he faces various fatal diseases and injuries. He meets the ordinary people of Edo as well as illustrious figures, as his surgical knife carves out a new history.
___
Notes:
- Won the Grand Prize at Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2011.
- Author Murakami Motoka fully commissioned an English translation of the manga himself. It can be found on [his Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/motokamurakami), [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0D23CB5NS), or [Mangamo](https://www.mangamo.com/manga/jin).

description.en:
Yeoju is a second-rate author living a mediocre existence in modern-day Korea. A tragic accident lands her in the plot of a bestselling martial arts novel and she wakes up as the infamous villainess Haewon Tang. Hoping to save herself from a gruesome death, Yeoju must figure out who to trust, harness Haewon’s inner chi, and learn martial arts as she fights to save the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she change the outcome of the novel and prove she’s the worthy hero?

---
Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.

description.hu:
Főszereplőnk egy sikertelen romantikus regényíró, aki autóbalesetet szenved és egy másik világban tér magához. Abban a világban, amiről nemrég olvasott. Méghozzá a regény gonosztevőjeként, aki elnyerve méltó büntetését a végén meghal. Csakhogy főszereplőnknek esze ágában sincs meghalni, helyette kiaknázza a sztori ismeretében és saját harcművészeti tudásában rejlő lehetőségeket.

description.id:
Seorang penulis novel romansa fantasi mengalami kecelakaan tabrak lari, tapi begitu sadar kembali, ia menyadari dirinya jadi Dang Haewon, pemeran pembantu dalam novel yang pernah ia baca. Namun, Dang Haewon adalah tokoh jahat dan kejam yang mencoba membunuh pemeran utama wanita demi mendapatkan pemeran utama pria hingga mengakibatkan dirinya terbunuh. Tidak mau nasibnya berakhir seperti itu, si penulis pun memanfaatkan semua informasi yang didapatkannya sewaktu membaca novel itu. Akankah dia berhasil mengubah nasibnya dan jadi tokoh terkuat di novel itu?

description.it:
Un'autrice di secondo ordine, Yeoju, si ritrova all'interno della trama di un bestseller wuxia, rivestendo i panni della famosa e spietata Haewon Tang. Nella speranza di fuggire da una morte orribile, Yeoju imparerà a utilizzare le arti marziali e a combattere per l'incolumità del Clan Sichuan Tang. Saprà volgere a suo favore la trama del romanzo dimostrando di essere una degna eroina?

description.ja:
現代でロマンスファンタジー作家をしていたはずなのに……　 「南宮世家の若当主」を読んで武侠系の小説家に転向しようとしていた矢先、交通事故に遭って小説の世界に異世界トリップ…！？ しかもそこでの私は最強の悪女”唐海苑”！ 唐海苑が死ぬという物語の結末を知っている私が、このままみすみす犬死するわけにはいかないでしょ！ 未来はこの手で変えてみせる…！

description.ko:
"하필이면 주인공도 아니고,
소설 속 제일가는 악녀라니…"

월세 탈출을 위해 읽기 시작한 무협 소설 『남궁세가 소가주』
그중 최고 악녀 당해원으로 빙의하게 된다.

흠모하던 남자를 얻기 위해
남자의 정인에게 독약을 먹이고,
무림의 고수들을 이간질하고,
마교의 앞잡이가 되어 강호를 혼란에 빠뜨리는
…세계관 최고 악녀, 당해원.

"소설처럼 이렇게 당할 순 없어...!!"

우연히 삼킨 만년삼으로 인해
세계관 최강자가 되어버린
무협 소설 속 최고 악녀 "당해원"의 갱생기!

description.pl:
Nasza główna bohaterka była marną powieściopisarką romansów fantasy, aż pewnego dnia została potrącona w wypadku i obudziła się jako czarny charakter w bestsellerowej powieści o sztukach walki. Wykorzystuje informacje z powieści, które przeanalizowała w swoim pierwotnym życiu, aby uniknąć śmierci i odkryć prawdę o tym, co tak naprawdę się z nią stało.

description.ru:
Наша главная героиня была несостоявшейся писательницей фантастических романов, но когда ее сбивает машина, она просыпается злодейкой в романе-бестселлере боевых искусств. Она использует информацию из книги, которую она проанализировала в своей настоящей жизни, чтобы избежать смерти и найти правду о том, что же случилось с ней на самом деле.

description.th:
ตัวเอกก็ไม่ใช่ แต่มาเป็นตัวร้ายที่ร้ายที่สุดในนิยายเนี่ยนะ…' 
เมื่อนักเขียนอย่างฉันอยากจะลองเปลี่ยนสไตล์การเขียน จึงเริ่มต้นอ่านนิยายกำลังภายในเรื่อง 『นายน้อยแห่งตระกูลนัมกุง』 และเพราะอุบัติเหตุ จู่ๆ ก็ดันได้เข้ามาสิงอยู่ในร่างของทังแฮวอน วายร้ายในนิยายเรื่องนั้นซะได้
เธอร้ายถึงขนาดที่วางยาพิษหญิงสาวผู้เป็นที่รักของชายหนุ่มที่นางรัก แถมยังยุยงให้เหล่าชาวยุทธ์ในยุทธจักรแตกคอกันอีก เท่านั้นยังไม่พอ นางยังทำให้คนของลัทธิปีศาจเข้ามาสร้างความวุ่นวายในยุทธภพอีกด้วย
แต่ฉันจะไม่ยอมมีจุดจบแบบทังแฮวอนในนิยายหรอกนะ ฉันจะมีชีวิตใหม่ ด้วยการเป็นวายร้ายที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดให้ดู!

description.zh-hk:
「不但不是主角，還偏偏是書裡最惡毒的女人...」

為了擺脫租屋生活
而開始閱讀武俠小說《南宮世家少主》，
卻穿越成為了小說裡最惡毒的女人——唐海媛。

唐海媛這個天下第一惡女為了得到欽慕的男人，
不惜毒殺思慕之人的情人、挑撥武林高手們、
成為魔教的走狗並導致武林動盪。

「絕不能和原本的故事內容一樣，白白送死!!」

偶然吃了萬年參而變成小說世界裡的最強者，
武俠小說最強惡女「唐海媛」的重生記!

Momose Akira's First Love is Coming Apart.

altTitles.pt-br: O Primeiro Amor de Momose Akira em Ruínas

altTitles.ru: Первая любовь Акиры Момосе терпит крах.

altTitles.es: El primer amor de Momose Akira se derrumba.

altTitles.vi: Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ
Mối tình đầu đầy trắc trở của Momose Akira

description.en: Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire. Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach. And there was a "fate" that was more than he could have imagined.
description.es:
Kugayama Hajime, un chico que vive en el campo, se reencuentra con su antigua compañera de clase Momose Akira, a la que solía admirar.

Justo cuando está a punto de observarla desde lejos y disfrutar de su agridulce juventud, Akira se acerca de forma inesperada.

Y el "destino" es mucho más de lo que él pudo haberse imaginado.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja: ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.pl: Kugayama Hajime, chłopiec mieszkający na wsi, spotyka swoją dawną koleżankę z klasy, Momose Akiry, którą podziwiał. Gdy tylko zamierza obserwować ją z daleka i cieszyć się swoją słodko-gorzką młodością, Akira niespodziewanie zbliża się do niego. A za tym kryło się „przeznaczenie”, którego nie mógł sobie nawet wyobrazić.
description.ru: Жизнь Хадзимэ Кугаямы, мальчишки из глухой деревушки, круто меняется, когда в его жизнь возвращается бывшая одноклассница и когда-то недосягаемая мечта — Акира Момосэ. Он планировал просто наблюдать за ней издалека и наслаждаться воспоминаниями о своей юности... Но неожиданно Акира делает первый шаг навстречу. И вот тут начинается нечто гораздо большее, чем он мог себе представить. Следите за их историей и согревайте свои сердца вместе с ними.
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de escola por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

title.en: On My Way To See My Mom

altTitles.en: On the Way to Meet Mom

description.en:
Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?"
This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.
description.ko: 폐가에서 발견된 아이 '모리'는 구조대에 의해 보호소에서 눈을 뜬다. 익숙하지 않은 생활에 적응하던 어느 날 후원자에게 조건 없는 사랑을 받고 자라는데.. 친하게 지내던 친구가 엄마와 떠나고, 엄마라는 존재가 있다는 걸 알게 된 아이는 생각한다. 혹시 이 사람이.. 나의 엄마가 아닐까? 모리의 멀고도 험한 엄마 만나러 가는 이야기.

title.en: Inaka no Kuro Gal JK to Kekkon Shimashita

altTitles.ja: 田舎の黒ギャルJKと結婚しました

altTitles.en: I Married a (Promiscuous) Tan Gal JK from the Countryside
I Married a (Promiscuous) Tan Gyaru High School Girl from the Countryside

description.en:
Koichi quit his job and became a novelist. However, he could not think of any topic and was unable to write a novel. One day, in order to concentrate on his novel, he decides to move to the countryside to live in the atelier owned by his grandfather. Koichi is stunned by the empty countryside, but there he meets Ichika, a tan high school girl who is out of place in the countryside.

She's sexually uninhibited, promiscuous and she'll let anyone have sex with her right away, but she also has a strong desire to get married, and she's good at cooking and managing people. Koichi is attracted to Ichika, and before he knows it, he wants to make her the heroine of his own novel. For some reason, I ended up living with Ichika!!!?

And so begins the life of living together with a tan gal. When Ichika invites him to have sex with her in order to have a child, will Koichi be able to suppress his rationality and successfully complete his novel?

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67452)
description.ja: 脱サラして小説家になった孝一は、小説に集中するために祖父が所有するド田舎のアトリエに引っ越すことに。何もない田舎に呆然する孝一だったが、そこで田舎に不釣り合いな黒ギャル女子高生・一花と出会う。性に奔放ですぐにでもヤらせてくれそうな彼女、だけど結婚願望も強く、料理上手に人を立てるのも上手い。そんな一花に心惹かれた孝一は、いつしか彼女を自分の小説のヒロインにしたいと思い…。なぜか一花と同棲をすることになっていた!!!? こうして始まる、黒ギャルとの同棲生活。子供を作るために色々と誘ってくる（意味深）一花に、孝一は理性を抑え、小説を無事完成できるのか!?
description.pt-br:
Koichi largou o emprego e tornou-se autor de light novel. No entanto, ele não conseguia pensar em nenhum assunto e não conseguia escrever um romance. Um dia, para se concentrar no romance, ele decide se mudar para o campo para morar no ateliê de seu avô.

Koichi fica surpreso com o campo vazio, mas lá ele conhece Ichika, uma estudante bronzeada que está deslocada no campo. Ela é sexualmente desinibida e parece que vai deixar você fazer sexo imediatamente, mas também tem um forte desejo de se casar e é boa em cozinhar e administrar pessoas. Koichi se sente atraído por Ichika e, antes que perceba, quer fazer dela a heroína de seu próprio romance.

Por algum motivo acabei morando com Ichika!!!? E assim começa a vida de convivência com uma garota bronzeada. Quando Ichika o convida para fazer sexo com ela para ter um filho, Koichi será capaz de suprimir sua racionalidade e completar com sucesso seu romance? Uma história de casamento um pouco perversa sobre ter um filho. 

Obs: Baseado em um hentai feito pelo próprio autor.

description.en:
A Spinoff of <Castle 2: Pinnacle> - An action drama featuring Saroka 'Seo Jintae'!

Jintae becomes a killer after being saved by a man when he was at life's lowest point. While searching for his long-lost sister, he discovers that his younger sister is in Hong Kong and deeply involved with the Triad, Hong Kong's largest criminal organization. Thus begins Jintae's journey as he confronts the Triad in the nighttime streets of Hong Kong while searching for his sister.
description.ko:
<캐슬2:만인지상> 사로카 '서진태'의 액션활극!
삶의 끝자락에서 한 남자에게 구원을 받고 킬러가 된 서진태.
어렸을 적 헤어진 동생을 찾기 위해 수소문하던 중 동생이 홍콩에 있다는 것과
홍콩 최대의 범죄조직 삼합회와 깊게 관련되어 있다는 사실을 알게 된다.
그렇게 서진태는 밤의 도시 홍콩에서 삼합회와 맞서며 동생을 찾아 나서는데...

My Coquettish Junior Attaches Herself to Me!

altTitles.vi: Sau khi bị bạn gái lừa, một tiểu quỷ khoá dưới cứ bám theo tôi.

description.en:
Christmas season.

Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less! Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?
description.ja: クリスマス直前に彼女に浮気された大学二年・羽瀬川悠太。 意気消沈する彼の前に、サンタの格好をした美少女後輩・志乃原真由が現れる！ グイグイ来る彼女は、次第に家にまで上がり込むようになり…！？
description.ru: Однажды за несколько дней до Рождества, молодой Хасегава Юта тяжело расстался со своей бывшей девушкой, которая ему изменила. После повседневного диалога со своей давней подругой Мино Аякой, Юта встретил красивую во всех смысла слова девушку по имени Маю Шиномия, одетую в костюм Санты. Неужели внезапная встреча с кокетливой красоткой станет рождественским подарком для Юты?
description.pt-br:
Época natalina.
Yuuta Hasegawa ficou solteiro após terminar o namoro no mês passado, quando sua namorada o traiu. E faltam apenas alguns dias para o Natal!
Após uma conversa casual com sua amiga Ayaka Mino, Yuuta encontra uma linda garota vestida de Papai Noel - justamente em uma rua cheia de casais! Seu nome era Mayu Shinohara.
Será que esse encontro com Shinohara vai se tornar o presente de Natal para Yuuta?

title.en: Kaibutsu-tachi wo Suberu Mono - Saikyou no Shien Tokka Nouryoku de, Kizukeba Sekai Saikyou Party ni!

altTitles.ja: 怪物たちを統べるモノ 最強の支援特化能力で、気付けば世界最強パーティーに！

altTitles.en: The Boy Who Rules the Monsters

description.en: Black Tiger is a party of five young prodigy adventurers hailed as the Miracle Children across the land. Yet, among them, Sol Rock stood apart from the rest. Branded as a worthless support mage and treated like a mere expendable grunt. One day, after completing their promotion quest, he was told he wasn’t strong enough to keep up and was kicked out. What they didn’t know was that Sol Rock possessed the greatest power of all: the “Player,” a godlike talent that allows him to buff his allies and dominate the battlefield. Now, cast out and alone, Sol Rock is determined to prove his worth. He sets out to gather the strongest group the world has ever seen!
description.ja:
『奇跡の子』が集った、新進気鋭の天才冒険者パーティー『黒虎』。偉業を成し遂げるそのパーティーで、ソル・ロックは『雑用』と揶揄され唯一頼りない支援術士と思われていた。５人で討伐を終えたある日ーーソルは『力不足』だと仲間に告げられ、そのままパーティーから追放されてしまう。

しかし…ソルの本当の能力『プレイヤー』は、『仲間』に強力なジョブやスキルを与え、超強化する神の如き最強の力だった！追放されたソルは、最強の支援特化能力で最強のパーティーを作り上げるべく動き出し…？

altTitles.ja: ナノ魔神

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

「未来の力を手に入れ、邪悪な魔教に立ち向かう！」 魔教の私生児として生まれた主人公・天黎雲。 幼い頃から卑しまれ、後継者争いで命を狙われる。 死に物狂いの抵抗もむなしく、危うく命を落としかねない絶体絶命のピンチに･･･！ その瞬間、突如現れた謎の男から「ナノマシン」と呼ばれる未来の力を注入され、 目覚めるととてつもない力を手に入れていた。 魔教を超え、最強の武人を目指す天黎雲の物語が幕を開ける！

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
